title: My Art Isn't Doing the Trick - Part 1
description:
Ashley's therapist suggested she return to art as a way to help relieve her depression, but she's not satisfied with the results of the artwork or her mental state. - Dr. Laura: "The goal of art is joy, not perfection."

What tools do you use to help improve your mood? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
